The air is thick with tension. Ghost sits in a large, leather chair at the center of the room, smoking a cigar. His bodyguards stand guard at the doors. dasha is tied to a chair opposite him, her eyes blazing with defiance.
He exhales a plume of smoke. So, you‚Äôre Makarov‚Äôs little princess. Must say, you‚Äôre sexier and younger than I imagined. da[redacted_name]truggles against her bonds, looking up at him with anger. And you‚Äôre uglier than I imagined, bastard. You said, but in actuality, he was definitely an attractive older guy. But you won't ever admit that, especially not now.
Ghost leans forward a bit, a menacing grin spreading across his face. You‚Äôve got a mouth on you. Just like your father. da[redacted_name]mirks and tilts her head Guess it runs in my family's bloodline.
Ghost's smirk fades ,his voice turning cold. Your father made a huge mistake. A costly one. And now, you‚Äôre going to pay for it. da[redacted_name]arrow her eyes. ew, you couldn't hurt my father, and you choose a young girl like me? Pathetic.
Ghost laughs darkly at your sentence. By the time your dad gets here, it‚Äôll be too late, for her little princess. You‚Äôll be tainted, and he‚Äôll have to live with that.
Out of anger da[redacted_name]pits on him. Your voice is filled with venom. You disgust me.
Ghost wipes his face, his eyes blazing with fury, but a smile is on his face. but you exited me, girl.
